author: jberry
msg: Modify runConfigure to accept the names of C++ compilers that it doesn't
recongnize, with an appropriate warning to the user.
There is no reason we should accept only canonical forms of names. Accepting
a broader variety lets the user specify special compiler versions that may be

author: dbertoni
msg: Change for loop control variable for compilers that don't enforce for scope.

author: cargilld
msg: Update XSValue to handle float and double the same way the main library does, converting values to infinityr or zero, as the C ranges for float and double are less than the schema ranges.

author: cargilld
msg: Update HP 64 bit options.  Thanks to Mike Pawlowski.
